channel.title: [PI] Models in Cache? Help me please!
channel.description: Hey Ho Guys! I'm wondering how can I change the location my client will took models from?(Explanation: I want to put my Raw folder into my cache(located on C drive) because I need to load D claws and vesta) Help will be very appriciated! :D Btw I'm using Galkon's renamed client!!!

item.title: [PI] Models in Cache? Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

method for preloading is generally inside the client class under the method name of preloadModels()

just search for “Raw”

Read full topic
